properties.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<policies>
  <inbound>
    <base />
    <!-- Enterprise: 10000 req/min, 50M req/month (customizable per customer) -->
    <rate-limit-by-key calls="10000" renewal-period="60" counter-key="@(context.Subscription.Id)" />
    <quota-by-key calls="50000000" renewal-period="2592000" counter-key="@(context.Subscription.Id)" />
  </inbound>
  <backend>
    <base />
  </backend>
  <outbound>
    <base />
  </outbound>
  <on-error>
    <base />
  </on-error>
</policies>
